document.full_text: russian law enforcement agencies freed the 20-year old son of kasperky lab's founder eugene kaspersky following a kidnapping last week, the leading anti-virus software firm said in a statement on sunday.
document.title: russia kaspersky lab says founder's son freed
lines_and_colors: russian law enforcement agencies freed the 20-year old son of kasperky lab's founder eugene kaspersky following a kidnapping last week, the leading anti-virus software firm said in a statement on sunday.
